title: Cinema Club Membership
description: Join the Fort Kent Cinema family and enjoy exclusive benefits all year long. Our Cinema Club members are the heart of our community.

plans.name: Silver Screen
plans.description: Enjoy the silver screen at silver prices. Our senior members make every matinee feel like a community gathering.
perks: $2 off ALL matinee tickets ($6 instead of $8)
Bring a companion at member matinee pricing ($6)
FREE small popcorn on your birthday month
Member pricing on private rentals (10% off)
Early email notice of special screenings
plans.valueCallout: Just a few movie dates and your membership pays for itself

plans.name: Individual
perks: $4 off ALL evening tickets ($8 instead of $12)
FREE small popcorn on your birthday month
Member pricing on private rentals (10% off)
Early email notice of special screenings
plans.valueCallout: A movie a month with popcorn? You've saved more than your membership cost.

plans.name: Cinema Supporter
perks: $4 off ALL evening tickets ($8 instead of $12)
FREE small popcorn on your birthday month
Member pricing on private rentals (15% off)
plans.valueCallout: Your monthly free ticket nearly covers the membership. Everything else is pure savings‚Äîplus you're keeping your community cinema alive.

plans.name: Family
perks: $4 off ALL evening tickets ($8 instead of $12)
FREE small popcorn on birthday month for each family member
Member pricing on birthday party packages (15% off)
plans.valueCallout: A family movie night once a month saves you nearly $200 a year.

plans.name: Family Plus
perks: $4 off ALL evening tickets ($8 instead of $12)
Up to 4 FREE movie tickets per month
FREE small popcorn on birthday month for each family member
plans.valueCallout: 48 free tickets per year is worth nearly $500. Add family discounts and you're getting incredible value.

footer: Every membership keeps our projector running and our doors open. Thank you, Fort Kent.
